sentences.en: Alas, the case of the lackadaisical Lakers might just have been solved.
sentences.cn: 额, 他们的懒散毛病貌似已经差不多解决了.

sentences.en: David has a rather lackadaisical approach to his work.
sentences.cn: 戴维的工作态度有点懒散。

sentences.en: Dr. Jonsen seemed a little lackadaisical at times.
sentences.cn: 琼森医生有时候似乎有点懈怠。

sentences.en: His will was sapped and his whole attitude was lackadaisical.
sentences.cn: 心里松懈,身态与神气便吊儿啷当.

sentences.en: Lao Wang is very serious with work, so do not be lackadaisical.
sentences.cn: 老王干活可较真儿啦,你可别马马虎虎的.

sentences.en: My problem is, that when we get a few wins, we become lackadaisical.
sentences.cn: 我的问题是, 当取得一点点地胜利时, 我们就会变得懒洋洋的.

sentences.en: Select kidneys and maintenance, so that my energy away from the valedictory lackadaisical days of fatigue!
sentences.cn: 选择肾部保养, 让自己精力充沛,远离疲劳告别无精打采的日子!

sentences.en: She was annoyingly lackadaisical and impractical.
sentences.cn: 令人恼火的是,她既懒又不脚踏实地.

sentences.en: So , Cicero first warned us against the danger of being lackadaisical.
sentences.cn: 西塞罗首先警告我们要注意萎靡不振的危险.

sentences.en: The lackadaisical clerk threw my change on the counter.
sentences.cn: 那个懒散的店员将我的零钱扔在柜台上.

sentences.en: There'll be no time to correct lackadaisical driving techniques after trouble develops ( William J. Hampton )
sentences.cn: 等到麻烦显现时再纠正动作迟缓的驾驶技术就来不及了 ( 威廉J. 汉普顿 )

sentences.en: There'll be no time to correct lackadaisical driving techniques after trouble develops.
sentences.cn: 等到麻烦显现时再纠正动作迟缓的驾驶技术就来不及了.

words.tran_cn: 懒洋洋的；无精打采的；伤感的

trans.tran_cn: 无精打采的，不决断的，不热心的
trans.tran_en: not showing enough interest in something or not putting enough effort into it
